summary:
enb 24 is a custom configuration of v.0.168 (v.0.172 pending) compatible with CoT & RLO.

Includes:
- Near vanilla color palette
- Bright days, soft sunrays & glowing Magnus corona
- Rich shadows, moody grey storms, and dark nights
- Subtle bloom & naturalistic sunsprite
- Soft Depth of Field & Bokeh settings
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://users.rcn.com/zer01chi/enb24-banner.png[/img][/center]
[color=orange]::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::features[/color][list]
[*] [b]Near[/b] [color=grey]vanilla color palette[/color]
[*] [b]Bright[/b] [color=grey]days,[/color] [b]soft[/b] [color=grey]sunrays &[/color] [b]glowing[/b] [color=grey]Magnus corona[/color]
[*] [b]Rich[/b] [color=grey]shadows,[/color] [b]moody[/b] [color=grey]grey storms, and[/color] [b]dark[/b] [color=grey]nights[/color]
[*] [b]Subtle[/b] [color=grey]bloom &[/color] [b]naturalistic[/b] [color=grey]lens flare/sunsprite[/color]
[*] [b]Soft[/b] [color=grey]Depth of Field & Bokeh settings[/color][/list]

[color=orange]::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::compatibility[/color]
[center]This has been optimized to work with...

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img687/4839/rlo.png[/IMG][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img69/9439/coty.png[/IMG][/url]

[color=grey]... though it [i]should[/i] be fine with any other lighting/weather mod.[/color][/center]
[color=orange]::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::installation[/color]
1. Download [url=http://www.enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]enb v0.168[/url].
Unzip the \"WrapperVersion\" folder to your game\'s root folder
[color=grey] [i]([u]ex[/u]. C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)[/i][/color]

2. Unzip the \"Main File\" [color=grey](enb 24 - Configuration Files)[/color] to the game\'s root folder

3. Install the enb patch [color=grey][i](also provided for download under \"Optional Files\" for convenience)[/i][/color]

* [u]NOTE 1[/u]: Users of SparrowPrince\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268/]W.A.T.E.R. mod[/url] should also grab the compatibility patch [color=grey] found on the [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499]ENB website[/url][/color]

* [u]NOTE 2[/u]: [i]Khajiit[/i] players [color=grey](including [i]Werewolf[/i] or [i]Vampire[/i] characters that require [i]Beast Vision[/i])[/color] will need to make a simple modification...
[center]edit [color=green]enbseries.ini[/color] [color=grey]([i]under[/i] [EFFECT]) [/color]: ... set [color=red]UseOriginalPostProcessing[/color]=true.[/center]
[color=orange]::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::recommendations[/color]
1. Make sure that your monitor is calibrated. [color=grey]
Try the [url=http://www.lagom.nl/lcd-test/]Lagom LCD monitor test pages[/url][/color]

2. For best results with minimal conflict, disable visual settings on both video card & in game.

Specifically, turn off: [list]
[*]video card: Antialiasing - Transparency, Antialiasing -FXAA
[*]game settings: Antialiasing, Anistropic Filtering[/list]
[color=orange]::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::troubleshooting & errata[/color]
Information can be found under related topics in this mod\'s [i]Forums[/i] section.

[center][img]http://users.rcn.com/zer01chi/sab_ban.png[/img][/center]

[color=yellow]NOTE:[/color] [color=orange]Nvidia GeForce320.18[/color] Driver makes a mess of the sun rays effect (resulting in it bleeding through objects).
For these users, I recommend rolling back to [color=yellow]314.22[/color] or disabling sunrays until a solution is found/provided.

[color=orange]::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::SPECIAL THANKS TO...[/color][list]
[*] [color=red]Bosir Vorontsov[/color] for his [b]ENB[/b] hard work that made it all possible
[*] [color=orange]Polo[/color] for his exquisitely naturalistic [color=grey][i](eyeball not lens effect)[/i][/color] [b]sunsprite[/b]
[*] [color=yellow]americanflyer82[/color] for his 24hr color palette [color=grey][i](first designed for Rex flight simulator)[/i][/color]
[*] [color=green]mindflux[/color] for the particle patch
[*] [color=violet]Matsuo[/color] for the Bokeh code
[i]...and the [b]ENB community[/b] for all your hard work, shared thoughts and inspiration[/i][/list]
author: zer01chi
